snippet: Every team will play at least one game on Thursday and also have at least one prime-time game, on either Thursday, Sunday or Monday.
abstract: Every team will play at least one game on Thursday and also have at least one prime-time game, on either Thursday, Sunday or Monday.

headline.main: More Thursday Night Games for the N.F.L.
headline.print_headline: Notebook: N.F.L. Turning On More Thursday Night Lights in 2012
